moves.1. f4 c6 2. e4 d5 3. e5 Bf5 4. d4 e6: I played often Caro-Kann before, with f4 it is weaker with white.
moves.5. a3: To prevent Bb4 . Needless. White has more territory.
moves.6. Nf3 a6: After c5 white can create a pin with Bb5  and exchange my Knight, what I will need later as the only active piece.
moves.11. h4: Weakens the kingside. Maybe Nbd2-g4-Ng3 is better. White has time. Donot need attack like this move.
